function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Individuals not following public health guidelines","Impact":"Increased transmission of contagious diseases, strain on healthcare systems, higher mortality rates","Mitigation":"Clear, accessible communication of guidelines, enforcement of regulations, public education and awareness campaigns","Technologies":"Digital communication tools for disseminating information, contact tracing apps, surveillance technologies for monitoring compliance","People":"General public, vulnerable populations, healthcare workers","Owner":"Government, public health authorities, community leaders"},{"Description":"Panic buying and hoarding in supermarkets","Impact":"Shortages of essential goods, increased prices, unequal access to resources","Mitigation":"Regulation of product purchases, public education on responsible consumption, support for vulnerable populations","Technologies":"Supply chain management systems, online grocery delivery platforms, inventory tracking technologies","People":"Consumers, vulnerable populations, retailers","Owner":"Retailers, government, consumer advocacy groups"},{"Description":"Dependency on online shopping and home deliveries","Impact":"Strain on delivery services, potential exposure of delivery personnel, reduced access for those without online capabilities","Mitigation":"Investment in delivery infrastructure, support for vulnerable populations, digital inclusion initiatives","Technologies":"Drones for delivery, autonomous delivery vehicles, digital payment systems","People":"Consumers, vulnerable populations, delivery personnel","Owner":"Delivery companies, government, technology companies"}]}
